segments.text: I'm observing the adult woman in this kitchen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's standing right in front of the overflowing sink.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water is gushing onto the floor, making a huge puddle.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her foot is literally submerged in it, yet she doesn't react.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: How can someone be so utterly unaware of their surroundings?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's almost infuriating to watch her polish that plate so calmly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children are just behind her, engaged in risky cookie theft.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They could fall, and the floor is becoming a dangerous hazard.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her complete lack of attention is truly astounding.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's dressed in an apron and a dress, looking quite ordinary.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's like she's in her own little bubble, oblivious to reality.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I just want to shout and make her look down at her wet feet!
segments.speaker: PAR
